@megamanrulesall (not sure if you use the @ thing on TPB or if it's just YouTube but I am addressing you so what the hey)

I have a reliable source of HB content meaning I have a folder on my HDD of all HB content kept up to date and thus I can post a siterip secure in the knowledge that it is a complete siterip. With other furry paysites I haven't yet secured access to someone with content, so I rely on other people leaking it through TFA (the site that uses TOR and runs on the chan software). As soon as I find a reliable source of ClubStripes/SexyFur etc. content or get enough donations through my blog to pay for a subscription I will start posting siterips of them.
